Class Threads

extends Object
    Thread utilities.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas

      static Thread[] getThreads() 
      static int randomFirst(int nr, Thread[] threads)
      get a random selection of nr Threads from the array, the first nr location in the array will contain the random set,m the rest will be null.

    • Method Detail

      • getThreads

        public static Thread[] getThreads()

      • randomFirst

        public static int randomFirst(int nr,
                              Thread[] threads)
        get a random selection of nr Threads from the array, the first nr location in the array will contain the random set,m the rest will be null.
        Parameters:
        nr - number of threads to randomly select.
        threads - the array of threads to select from
